paragraphs: I created this page to document each step of building the "Support My Journey" blog â€“ a place where I share my dreams and seek kind-hearted support from the community.

From the early days of learning how to set up a blog, customising its layout, linking PayPal, and setting up the donation button... every moment was meaningful. I wanted to capture this as a personal reflection and offer it to anyone walking a similar path.

9 July 2025 â€“ Continued refining the translation system within posts.

13 July 2025 â€“ The site now supports 8 languages (translated using AI). As this significantly lengthened the HTML, I decided to migrate content into external JSON files (hosted on GitHub + Cloudflare Pages) for easier management.
14 July 2025 â€“ Resolved language switcher issues by combining all into a single button with a dropdown, ensuring cleaner UI and scalability.
15 July 2025 â€“ Optimised SEO to help more people discover the blog.
15 July 2025 â€“ Testing auto-updating donation progress via Google Sheets. PayPal data still requires manual input for security and simplicity.
